title: Hey T206 Collectors -- what are you looking for?
author: wazoo

posts.post_title: Hey T206 Collectors -- what are you looking for?
posts.post_content:
Hey guys. I thought it would be a good idea to create a thread here where t206 collectors can post what they are looking for and hopefully find a match. It's basically a want list. There are previous threads like this, which worked really well, but are not used anymore. So let me start off. I am looking for: 

  * Hall of Famers (Basically any;  SGC or PSA 3-4 condition please) 
  * Southern Leaguers (Basically any) 
  * Tough Commons (Ganley, Dahlen, etc.) 
  * Harder backs and SC Factory 42 overprint, 350-460 SC (factories 25, 30, and 42) and Sovereign 150. 


Just some ideas. Please, post your want list and hopefully we can find a match! Best regards. Maybe we can work a trade!

Good idea Wazzo !


Magie graded SGC AUTH or 10
low grade  John Titus
Yeah, will someone please sell me a drum?

[quote name="Blitzu" post=1077497]Yeah, will someone please sell me a drum?[/QUOTE]

If only I had one! 

And thanks Nelson!

Chief Bender Drum 

Low Grade WaJo Brown Hindu

Im in the process of selling off my PSA's and looking for SGC 50's.

I'm looking for 50's and trying to get some of the higher end stuff knocked out first. 

If anyone has SGC 50 HOF'ers, Southern Leaguers please let me know!  I have cash and can always purchase trade bait if we need to go that route as well.

T206 Red Hindu in a PSA 4 grade (any HOF or common)

T206 Carolina Brights in a PSA 4 grade (any HOF or common)

T206 Wiltse with Cap American Beauty or EPDG (any grade)

Looking for Sovereign Cubs in lower condition or high condition with qualifiers.
[url]milkit1@gmail.com[/url]
High appearance T 206 PSA 2 and 3 or SGC 30 or 40. You know those near mint looking cards with minor paper loss or better yet glue staining. And.. Any tobacco packaging or advertisements thereof.

My signature says it all... 
T206 in SGC 40
T206 miscuts with full name at top
low grade EPDG
SGC 40-60 E91-A

Looking for 
Dom Mullaney 
Lundgren Chicago

low grade is fine, but both of mine are really beat.

is this too much to ask?

1.  
2.

SGC 40-55, no stains or very visible creases on front

I need about 40 cards to finish my set minus the big 3 but it seems every time one of the cards I need is posted on these boards it is gone right away. (I have 3 of the Cobbs and most of the other key cards,only 3 slers left).

Looking to knock out the T201 set by the end of the year...currently 27/50 complete.  SGC/PSA 2-5 range.

Also looking for a T206 Titus in GD-VG condition
SGC graded 40 or higher Old Mill Southern Leaguers....:cool:

If anyone has a Lundgren (Chicago) that's been torn in half and stapled back together, I'd be interested in that!  ;)

Birmingham in F-G raw, any back

Any common F-G raw Tolstoi back

McQuillan throwing F-G raw, any back
Autographed T206 Cards!

Great Idea!

I am undertaking the HOF Portrait subset so am looking for most examples.  Condition isn't a big factor - prefer to keep them in SGC40 or worse.

Cards I DONT Need:
- Clarke
- Lajoie
- Willis
- Walsh

I'm excited to be back on this path as I had most back in 2007 but sold them off due to the economy and my job.

Bill Kasel
Low end Washington Senators.  SGC 10 to 30 for the most part.  I particularly like Polar Bear backs.
Looking for Providence players in the harder backs - Broadleaf, Car Brights, Drum, EPDG, and a couple in Amer Beauty

Athletics and Phillies.

2/20s to 40/4s.

My collecting days was 35 years ago. However, it would be nice to get a number graded Drum or a Broadleaf 460 back.
Anyone have any hall of fame t206s, 3-4 condition? Looking to trade raw stuff. I have a titus, Manion, and Kelley. More too.
Good post Wazoo, the only T206's I have been looking for is American Beauty backs.
Hey Andrew, PM Erick (t206hound), he's got one. Best of luck.

Mike
T206 Dahlen (Boston Nat'l)....last card I need to have the team set. Willing to spend up to $75 for the right one.
Looking for PD 42's and a case of .556 ammo at a good price !!

Yup... I've made a couple of deals. Keep 'em coming!
Yes, thanks to BuffetFan I knocked 5 cards off my list.  Thanks Michael!
Mike I have a Titus. Got anything in trade?
Prob not.  Would like one eventually, but, don't have much if anything to trade.
Looking for PSA 2's for my set in the link below that I'm missing.

I'm on the lookout for poor condition, beat up ungraded t206 commons (hof'ers if they're beat up and cheap!).  Trying to stay away from paper loss that greatly affects the quality of the picture.
Thanks-

Hello, friends. I would really appreciate any of the following cards.  These are the remaining cards I need to get to 518.

SGC 40-50 with solid eye appeal a must.

Cobb Bat On
Cobb Green
Elberfeld Wash.
Lajoie Bat and Throw
Matty Port.
Tinker Bat On and Port.
Shag
Young Glove and Bare Hand

Thank you very much for looking!

Best,

Andy

Looking for PSA 5s to get to 520.

I need a little less than half the set.

Top priority is Dahlen (Brooklyn).

Any help appreciated.

Scot

Hey Andy! Happy to see that you're almost there! You can see the finish line. Best of luck with finishing the 518 set.

I am working on a low quality raw set.  I just started at the end of last year and now have 46 but have kept the cost per at $10(just a bit over).  If you would like to sell 10-15 cards and help me get my cost per under $10, then give me a pm.
Thanks,
Paul

Changing my wants a little: 

To all you raw collectors, I'm looking for hall of famer t206s in SGC or PSA 3-4. I have a Joe Kelley, George Manion, and John Titus (not my newly acquired one) that I am willing to trade or bundle. Please PM, much help would be appreciated.

[quote name="wazoo" post=1078947]Hey Andy! Happy to see that you're almost there! You can see the finish line. Best of luck with finishing the 518 set.[/QUOTE]

Best,

Andy
